name: Deadline Delirium
description:
Don't drink and jam. And if you jam — then jam it till the end.

A classic-style point-and-click adventure game for the Linux Game Jam 2019.

Controls: LMB - use; RMB - look; F11 or Enter - toggle fullscreen.

Source code repo: https://github.com/Vladar4/ng2deadlinedelirium
